title: Can a person play a Native American flute without teeth? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, I don’t know anyone without teeth playing NAF, but I believe yes, you can. The only requirement is that you can form a tight seal between your lips and flute’s mouthpiece. Then you blow the air into the mouthpiece and you’re done. There’s no need to shape your lips in any complex way or utilize teeth or jaw movement in any way.
